meanings.sent1: My dog was pissing on the fire hydrant.
meanings.sent2: I need to go pissing before we leave the house.
meanings.sent3: The sound of pissing in the toilet woke me up early.
meanings.sent4: The rain was pissing down all night long.
meanings.sent5: The toddler's pissing in the pool caused a commotion.

meanings.sent1: The pissing noise from the leaky faucet kept me up all night.
meanings.sent2: Her constant pissing complaints were getting on my nerves.
meanings.sent3: The pissing fly buzzing around the room was driving me crazy.
meanings.sent4: The pissing traffic jam made me late for work.
meanings.sent5: The pissing sound of the alarm clock was unbearable.

meanings.sent1: He gave me a pissing look when I accidentally bumped into him.
meanings.sent2: She let out a pissing sigh after dealing with the difficult customer.
meanings.sent3: The pissing tone of his voice indicated his annoyance.
meanings.sent4: Her pissing outburst surprised everyone in the room.
